!define linkName_TestSuiteDemo {!-GoogleTestSymlink-!}
!define linkPath_TestSuiteDemo {!-TestSuiteDemo.FrontEndTests.T001GoogleTest-!}

!define linkName_BackEndSuite {!-FrontEndTestsSymlinks-!}
!define linkPath_BackEndSuite {!-FrontEndTests-!}


!4 1. Add a Symbolic link to the Test Suite Demo
|script                     |browser test                                                                           |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                                                          |
|Go to Property page                                                                                                |
|New Symbolic Link with name|${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}|and with path           |${linkPath_TestSuiteDemo}           |
|# Check if visable                                                                                                 |
|click                      |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo'])                                                    |
|ensure                     |is visible on page       |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}'])|


!4 2. Add a Symbolic link to the Back End Suite
|script                     |browser test                                                                                      |
|click                      |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests'])                                                  |
|Go to Property page                                                                                                           |
|New Symbolic Link with name|${linkName_BackEndSuite}|and with path                  |${linkPath_BackEndSuite}                 |
|# Check if visable                                                                                                            |
|click                      |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests'])                                                  |
|ensure                     |is visible on page      |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests.${linkName_BackEndSuite}'])|


!4 3. Check Symbolic link page on the top Suite and expect two links
|script|browser test                                                        |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                  |
|click |xpath=(//li[@id= 'tools']//a)                                       |
|click |xpath=(//ul[@class= 'dropdown-menu show']//li[3])                   |
|ensure|is visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= '${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}'])|
|ensure|is visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= '${linkName_BackEndSuite}']) |


!4 4. Check Symbolic link page on another Suite and expect one link
|script|browser test                                                            |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                      |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests'])                        |
|click |xpath=(//li[@id= 'tools']//a)                                           |
|click |xpath=(//ul[@class= 'dropdown-menu show']//li[3])                       |
|ensure|is not visible on page|xpath=(//td[text()= '${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}'])|
|ensure|is visible on page    |xpath=(//td[text()= '${linkName_BackEndSuite}']) |


!4 5. Sidebar has a Symbolic link icon
|script|browser test                                                                                                                   |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                                                                             |
|Toggle the sidebar                                                                                                                    |
|ensure|is visible on page|xpath=(//div[@id= 'sidebar']//li[@id= 'TestSuiteDemo${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}']/div/i[@class= 'fa fa-link'])|
|Toggle the sidebar                                                                                                                    |


!4 6. Remove the Symbolic link on the Test Suite Demo
|script|browser test                                                                        |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                                  |
|Go to Property page                                                                        |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= '?responder=symlink&removal=${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}'])          |
|# Check if visable                                                                         |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo'])                                                 |
|ensure|is not visible on page|xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.${linkName_TestSuiteDemo}'])|


!4 7. Remove the Symbolic link on the Back End Suite
|script|browser test                                                                                    |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests'])                                                |
|Go to Property page                                                                                    |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= '?responder=symlink&removal=${linkName_BackEndSuite}'])                       |
|# Check if visable                                                                                     |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests'])                                                |
|ensure|is not visible on page|xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.BackEndTests.${linkName_BackEndSuite}'])|
